de.payleven.payment

Class PaymentResult

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.payleven.payment.PaymentResult

  • public class PaymentResult
extends Object
    Contains payment data which is available after the payment completion.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  PaymentResult.AdditionalData
      Additional data available for the payment.

      String getAuthorizationCode()
      Returns the authorization code generated by the issuing bank of a payerâ€™s payment card, in order to validate a payment card when it is approved or declined in the sale of a good or service.

      String getMerchantIdentifier()
      Returns the payleven merchant account identifier that executed the payment attempt.
      BigDecimal getPaymentAmount()
      Returns the amount to be charged in a decimal format, which must be at least one major currency unit (e.g 1.00 Euro) and cannot be negative or zero.
      Currency getPaymentCurrency()
      Returns the payment's currency.
      Date getPaymentDate()
      Returns the local timestamp in UTC/GMT format when the payment was requested.
      String getPaymentIdentifier()
      Returns the payment identifier.
      PaymentState getPaymentState()
      Returns the state of the payment.
      ReceiptGenerator getReceiptGenerator()
      Returns an instance of ReceiptGenerator which allows to generate receipt image for the payment.
      String getSignatureImageUrl()
      Returns the URL of the stored signature image if the payment card requires the payer's signature as a payment verification method.
      PaymentState getState()
      Deprecated. 
      As of release 1.2.1, replaced by getPaymentState()
      String getTerminalIdentifier()
      Returns the serial number of the payleven terminal that facilitated the payment.

    • Method Detail

      • getId

        @Deprecated
public String getId()
        Deprecated. As of release 1.2.1, replaced by getPaymentIdentifier()

      • getPaymentIdentifier

        public String getPaymentIdentifier()
        Returns the payment identifier. Unique identifier (e.g order number) of the payment request. Please retain this identifier for your records and for further reference (e.g Refund).

      • getState

        @Deprecated
public PaymentState getState()
        Deprecated. As of release 1.2.1, replaced by getPaymentState()

      • getPaymentState

        public PaymentState getPaymentState()
        Returns the state of the payment.

      • getAmount

        @Deprecated
public BigDecimal getAmount()
        Deprecated. As of release 1.2.1, replaced by getPaymentAmount()

      • getPaymentAmount

        public BigDecimal getPaymentAmount()
        Returns the amount to be charged in a decimal format, which must be at least one major currency unit (e.g 1.00 Euro) and cannot be negative or zero.

      • getCurrency

        @Deprecated
public Currency getCurrency()
        Deprecated. As of release 1.2.1, replaced by getPaymentCurrency()

      • getPaymentCurrency

        public Currency getPaymentCurrency()
        Returns the payment's currency. A three-letter alphabetic code according to ISO 4217 representing the payment's currency that must match the merchant country's local currency. Supported currencies are EUR, GBP and PLN.

      • getAdditionalData

        public PaymentResult.AdditionalData getAdditionalData()
        Returns PaymentResult.AdditionalData of the payment attempt. Returns null if integrator account is not enabled. If you would like to create your own receipts, you will require these details. Please contact developer@payleven.com

      • getDate

        @Deprecated
public Date getDate()
        Deprecated. As of release 1.2.1, replaced by getPaymentDate()

      • getPaymentDate

        public Date getPaymentDate()
        Returns the local timestamp in UTC/GMT format when the payment was requested.

      • getSignatureImageUrl

        public String getSignatureImageUrl()
        Returns the URL of the stored signature image if the payment card requires the payer's signature as a payment verification method. Returns null if not applicable.

      • getTerminalIdentifier

        public String getTerminalIdentifier()
        Returns the serial number of the payleven terminal that facilitated the payment.

      • getReceiptGenerator

        public ReceiptGenerator getReceiptGenerator()
        Returns an instance of ReceiptGenerator which allows to generate receipt image for the payment. NOTE: Receipt image must be extended with the merchant's name, address and respective receipt identifier.

      • getAuthorizationCode

        public String getAuthorizationCode()
        Returns the authorization code generated by the issuing bank of a payerâ€™s payment card, in order to validate a payment card when it is approved or declined in the sale of a good or service.

      • getMerchantIdentifier

        public String getMerchantIdentifier()
        Returns the payleven merchant account identifier that executed the payment attempt.
